title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
good night's rest in camp might prove illuminating.

Continue travelling with Wyll.

We met Wyll's diabolical patron, Mizora, who was none too happy to find that Wyll failed to slay Karlach. She punished Wyll for his disobedience by turning him into a devil and departed - though it seems likely we'll meet her again. We met Wyll's diabolical patron, Mizora, who was pleased to find that he had slain Karlach. She rewarded him for his obedience and departed - though it seems likely we'll meet her a
